title: Going on to further study (Captioned)
brief_description: A humorous examination of the advantages and importance of further education to; a)levels of skill needed to match those of other countries and ; b)our children will have more time to devote to things other than earning a living. Further education gives them a better understanding of their place in the world and of themselves.
